desc: This project emphasizes advanced CAD techniques and detailed component integration to optimize performance, efficiency, and reliability. It reflects my passion for innovative automotive engineering and my commitment to delivering high-quality design solutions

desc: It was a challenging yet rewarding experience working on the assembly of various components, ensuring both structural integrity and functionality. This project honed my skills in 3D CAD modeling and assembly design.

name: 2-cylinder horizontal steam non-reversing engine
desc: This engine features a dual-cylinder configuration with precision-engineered connecting rods, pistons, and a sturdy flywheel for smooth power transmission. The design also incorporates efficient piping for steam flow and a rigid base for stability.
